title: mangaLam jaya
sahitya:
mangaLam jaya mangaLam mangaLam shubha mangaLam


caraNam 1    akrUragolida trivikramage nakrana gelida parAkramige 
shakrana garvapahArava mADida shakrana shiSyana gelidavage
    caraNam 2    gangeya paDeda shrI ranganige rangu mANikadunguradavage 
bhrnga kundaLeyara vratavena keDisida angajanayya shubhAnganige
    caraNam 3    dhareyoLadhika vEnkaTAcalage sthiravAgi puSkariNili nelasihage 
paratatva shrI puranadara viTTalage vara vEnkaTa shrInivAsanige
